DOC.detailed_description: In randomized clinical trial , patient IPH within 6 hour onset randomized one two study arm . In one arm , patient 72 hour TTM MIH ( 32-34 degree Celcius ) . In second arm , patient 72 hour TTM Normal Temperature ( NT ) ( 36-37 degree Celcius ) . Subjects arm otherwise receive identical therapeutic intervention pre-defined local IPH management protocol . Primary outcome examine frequency adverse event ( AEs ) possibly probably related treatment . AEs assess 15-days admission discharge earlier frequency severe adverse event ( SAEs ) possibly probably related treatment . SAEs assess 90-days . The secondary outcome measure in-hospital neurological deterioration day 0-7 ( decrease GCS10 ≥2 point , increase NIHSS11 ≥4 point ) , in-hospital mortality , modify Rankin Score [ mRS ] 12 discharge 90-days .
